mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (user_phone_num, user_email, user_name, user_pw) values(#{userPhoneNum}, #{userEmail}, #{userName}, #{userPw})
mapper.select: select count(user_num) from tbl_user where user_email = #{userEmail}
select user_num from tbl_user where user_email = #{userEmail} and user_pw = #{userPw}
select user_name, user_email, user_pw, user_phone_num from tbl_user where user_num = #{userNum}
